s: Summary: Stablecon Salon Hong Kong Edition is an invite‑only deep‑dive into stablecoin adoption, regulatory clarity and cross‑border settlement infrastructure in Asia.
Topics: Stablecoin regulation, on‑chain liquidity, trade finance, cross‑border settlement, infrastructure scaling.
Speakers: Sergio Mello (Anchorage), Angela Ang (TRM Labs), Kevin Kang (Reap), Jeannie Lim (Xweave).
r: Gain insider perspectives on Asian stablecoin regulatory trajectories.
Connect with architects of next‑gen settlement and liquidity platforms.
Identify market‑ready opportunities in trade‑finance tokenization.
